ygData.subject: Re: [EQ_rainbow] Lizards are Cute!
ygData.msgSnippet: Hehehe play the necro :) I have a lvl 51 necro, and he is a GOD heh. I almost never die and there is very little I can t kill. ...
ygData.messageBody:
Hehehe play the necro :) I have a lvl 51 necro, and he is a GOD heh. I
almost never die and there is very little I can't kill.


>From: Beth <jaguar@...>
>Reply-To: EQ_rainbow@egroups.com
>To: EQ_rainbow@egroups.com
>Subject: Re: [EQ_rainbow] Lizards are Cute!
>Date: Tue, 25 Apr 2000 11:30:56 -0400
>
>I think they're pretty cute too. And I already made my shaman. (and a necro
>and a monk) The shaman without spells survived much much better killing the
>same type of critter then the monk. The necro, well we won't talk about
>that.
>
>Roumor I heard about the lizzy monk is that instead of dragon punch at 20
>or 25 or whatever, they get tail sweep. ;-p I wanna see that!
>
>B
>
>At 09:29 AM 4/25/00 -0600, you wrote:
> >>>>
>Ok, this might just be a rant, but since it's non hostile I'm going to post
>it here =)
>
>WOW Iksar are so cute. The first time I ever saw one I was like...oh my
>gosh! It walks around and swings its little tail and talks and everything!
>It's like the best pet!
>
>And Kunark is very pretty. Lots of fun new zones, with cool looking
>critters. It's pretty obvious to me you could hunt in Kunark and never
>leave, and get all the way to 50. It seems a self sufficient continent.
>
>Kunark is dangerous though, I have talked to a lot of people who brought
>their mains over and got stomped by something.
>
>The solution to all this is...make an Iksar shaman! You get SOW at 9th
>level and you can explore like crazy. Team up with a friend and make an
>Iksar monk, and you have a great 2-person leveling/exploring team
>especially for low levels. FYI Iksar have regeneration, and the highest wis
>of the shaman races, making them the best shaman and monk races IMHO
>(though they aren't as cute as Duna).
>
>(Rumor: Iksar do not get the inherent haste that human monks get at level
>20+)
>
><http://click.egroups.com/1/3587/7/_/552123/_/956676579/>
>
><<<<
>
>
